Page.title: Welcome to iPlay4e!
Page.Intro: The iPlay4e tools work with your D&D Insider subscription to bring tabletop gaming to the online and mobile worlds. If you already have a Google account, just sign in above to get started uploading your own characters. If you don't, click the sign in link anyway and you can create an account in just a few minutes.

Section.title: Play 4e Dungeons & Dragons...
Section.Item: Join a campaign, or create one and invite your friends to join. View everyone's character sheet.
Turn D&Di Character Builder files into interactive character sheets. Diceless tabletop gaming is here!
Track hit points, power consumption, and more - everything you need to play at the gaming table.
The built-in D&Di Compendium browser lets you look up details for anything on the sheet without opening another window.

Section.title: ...even on your mobile or offline...
Section.Item:
NEW! The native iOS app,
iPlay4e Live, lets you access your characters without an internet connection.
The mobile version of the site lets you keep your characters in your pocket. Never forget your character sheet or dice again!
The native look-and-feel for iPhone and iPod Touch puts every character detail just a touch away.
Install Opera Mini on almost any mobile phone (Android, Blackberry, etc...) to turn your mobile device into a gaming machine.

Section.title: ...and share on the web
Section.Item: Search for characters by name, race, class, build, level. Download .dnd4e files as the basis for your own characters.
Export characters to the D&Di community, Something Awful play-by-post, and many other forums.
Embed and play characters and campaigns in Google Wave, on your iGoogle home page, on Epic Words, or any other web site.
